tentative_title: Design and Implement Chapter 2+ Learning Modules for Mathematical Biology
description_objective: Develop additional chapters for the mathematical biology learning module, matching the depth, structure, and computational rigor of Chapter 1. Each chapter should include theoretical exposition, coding walkthroughs, and a comprehensive self-assessment test.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Drafts of new chapter documents (e.g., Chapter 2: Multi-Species Models).
Associated Python notebooks for demonstrations.
Self-assessment tests for each new chapter.
Integrated CI testing for new notebooks.
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires selection of next topics (e.g., multi-species, stochastic models). Needs coordination with overall curriculum design.

tentative_title: Develop Quantitative Assessment Pipeline for Self-Assessment Results
description_objective: Design and implement a pipeline to systematically quantify self-assessment results from `section_1_test.md` and subsequent tests, enabling integration with the Cognitive Potential (C(t)) metric for the broader knowledge system.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Scripts or tools to parse and score self-assessment responses.
Documented method for mapping scores to C(t).
Automated reporting and feedback generation.
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires definition of scoring rubric and mapping logic. May need to coordinate with maintainers of the C(t) metric.

tentative_title: Integrate Demonstration Notebooks into Continuous Integration (CI) Workflow
description_objective: Ensure that all demonstration notebooks (e.g., `malthus_logistic_demo.ipynb`) are automatically tested in the CI pipeline, verifying their correctness and reproducibility as the curriculum evolves.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: CI scripts for notebook execution and validation.
Error reporting for failed notebook runs.
Documentation for maintaining CI integration.
notes_questions_dependencies: Depends on current CI setup and compatibility with notebook testing tools.

tentative_title: Design and Implement a Knowledge Creation & Synthesis Engine
description_objective: Develop system components and interfaces that support hypothesis generation, creative synthesis, analogical reasoning, and problem-solving in uncharted domains. Enable users to connect disparate knowledge and generate novel insights.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Module for hypothesis generation and tracking.
Creative synthesis tools (e.g., analogy assistant, conceptual blending prompts).
Interfaces for recording and evolving user-generated ideas.
Integration with knowledge graph.
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires collaboration with users to define workflows. Needs to interface with existing knowledge graph and literature systems.

tentative_title: Develop a Virtual Laboratory for Experiment Design and Validation
description_objective: Build a virtual laboratory module enabling users to design, simulate, and validate experiments (in silico), close the loop between hypothesis and data, and integrate results into the knowledge system.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Experiment design interface with DOE guidance.
Automated simulation execution and result capture.
Integration with knowledge graph and hypothesis tracking.
Reporting and feedback tools.
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires integration with simulation toolchains and parameter management. Needs to support multiple modeling paradigms (ODE, PDE, ABM, etc.).

tentative_title: Implement Collaborative Knowledge Building and External Validation Module
description_objective: Create tools and workflows for structured sharing of insights, hypotheses, and results; support for publication/dissemination; and tracking external validation and impact of created knowledge.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Module for structured sharing and peer review.
Publication preparation tools.
Impact monitoring (citations, altmetrics) and feedback integration.
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires integration with external APIs (e.g., Altmetric, Dimensions). Needs to support semantic mapping between internal and external knowledge structures.

tentative_title: Develop Meta-Cognitive Process Tracking and Digital Lab Notebook

source_reference.section: Meta-Cognition on the Process of Discovery

description_objective: Implement a digital lab notebook for tracking reasoning paths, failed hypotheses, and chains of thought. Support meta-cognitive reflection and process improvement for scientific discovery.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Digital lab notebook interface.
Tools for annotating reasoning paths and failed attempts.
Reporting and reflection features.
notes_questions_dependencies: Should be tightly integrated with hypothesis and experiment tracking modules.

tentative_title: Design and Prototype an Ethical Framework and Governance Layer
description_objective: Develop a framework and system hooks for flagging ethically sensitive research areas, aligning knowledge creation with higher-order values, and supporting governance of powerful knowledge.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Ethical flagging system integrated with knowledge graph.
Documentation and guidelines for ethical review.
Hooks for future governance mechanisms.
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires philosophical and stakeholder input. Should be extensible for future governance needs.

tentative_title: Implement Uncertainty and Ambiguity Management Tools

source_reference.section: Dealing with Uncertainty and Incomplete Knowledge

description_objective: Develop mechanisms for representing, reasoning with, and managing uncertainty, ambiguity, and conflicting information within the knowledge system.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Uncertainty tagging and propagation in the knowledge graph.
Interfaces for surfacing and resolving ambiguity.
Reporting tools for areas of sparse or conflicting knowledge.
notes_questions_dependencies: Should leverage existing semantic network infrastructure. May require new data models for uncertainty.

tentative_title: Develop Knowledge-to-Action Interface for Real-World Actuation
description_objective: Design interfaces and protocols for translating accumulated knowledge into actionable plans, engineering projects, or interventions aimed at ultimate goals (e.g., life extension, galactic expansion).
potential_deliverables_outcomes: APIs or modules for bridging knowledge to engineering/biological action.
Integration with project management and actuation systems.
Documentation of use cases and workflows.
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires collaboration with downstream engineering/operations teams. Needs to be adaptable for diverse actuation targets.

tentative_title: Develop Automated Idea-to-Hypothesis Formalization Engine
description_objective: Design and implement a module that translates informal research ideas into precise, parameterized, and testable hypotheses using a combination of AI-driven language models and structured formalisms.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Interactive interface for idea capture and refinement.
AI-assisted hypothesis generation pipeline.
Integration with knowledge graph and simulation modules.
Documentation and user guidance.
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires evaluation of existing LLM-based ideation tools and formalization frameworks. Needs to support both human-in-the-loop and automated workflows.

tentative_title: Implement Rigorous Analogical Reasoning and Structural Similarity Validation
description_objective: Develop algorithms and interfaces to enable robust analogical reasoning across scientific domains, ensuring structural validity and minimizing spurious correlations. Integrate symbolic and neural approaches for analogy mapping.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Analogical reasoning engine leveraging SMT and graph embeddings.
Structural similarity validation tools.
Integration with Think Tank and knowledge graph.
Evaluation framework for analogy quality.
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires benchmarking against existing analogy engines. Must address LLM limitations in structural mapping.

tentative_title: Build Simulation-to-Reality Validation Pipeline
description_objective: Create a pipeline for validating simulation results against empirical data, supporting multiple simulation modalities (ODE, PDE, ABM), and automating fidelity assessment and reporting.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Automated comparison of simulation and experimental data.
Support for model and experiment standards (SBML, SED-ML, FMI).
Uncertainty quantification and reporting.
Integration with Laboratory module.
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires integration with existing simulation tools and standards. Needs FAIR data support.

tentative_title: Develop Conceptual Knowledge Versioning and Provenance System
description_objective: Design a robust system for versioning and tracking the provenance of ideas, hypotheses, models, code, and data throughout the research lifecycle, leveraging ontologies, PROV standards, and integration with workflow tools.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Concept versioning infrastructure integrated with code/data versioning.
Automated provenance capture and visualization.
User interfaces for exploring intellectual lineage.
Documentation and best practices.
notes_questions_dependencies: Should build on existing tools (Git, DVC, Sumatra, AiiDA) and ontologies (PROV-O, P-Plan).

tentative_title: Implement Impact Feedback Loop and Semantic Alignment Engine
description_objective: Develop mechanisms to ingest, analyze, and semantically align external impact data (citations, altmetrics, reviews) with internal R&D components, using NLP, knowledge graphs, and human-in-the-loop annotation.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: APIs for ingesting external impact data.
NLP models for mapping feedback to internal objects.
Human-in-the-loop annotation tools.
Provenance integration and reporting.
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires access to external APIs (Altmetric, Dimensions), and robust entity/relation extraction.

tentative_title: Design and Implement Ethical and Epistemic Risk Mitigation Framework
description_objective: Develop a comprehensive framework and supporting tools for transparency, accountability, bias mitigation, and user control in AI-augmented research workflows.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Ethics and transparency guidelines.
Bias and fairness assessment tools.
User control and accountability features.
Documentation and educational materials.
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires multidisciplinary input (technical, philosophical, legal). Should align with existing standards (FAIR, PROV).

tentative_title: Implement One-Command arXiv Ingest Pipeline (P0)
description_objective: Develop and robustly implement a pipeline that ingests a single arXiv paper by URL/ID, downloads the PDF, extracts and stores metadata, creates a note skeleton, and triggers DocInsight indexing and summary.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: fetch_paper.py script fully functional
PDF and metadata stored for given arXiv ID
Note skeleton auto-generated
DocInsight API integration for summary and indexing
Unit and integration tests
notes_questions_dependencies: Depends on DocInsight service availability and correct API contract implementation.

tentative_title: Develop Semantic Search & Summary CLI Tool
description_objective: Implement a user-facing CLI tool (lit-search) that allows semantic search and summary across all curated papers with relevance scoring, leveraging DocInsight.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: lit-search CLI implemented
DocInsight client integration
Markdown-formatted answers with relevance score
Tests for search accuracy and robustness
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires functional DocInsight API and LanceDB index.

tentative_title: Automate Nightly Pre-Print Fetch and Ingest (P1)

source_reference.section: 1 · Vision & Measurable Goals (LIT-03), 4 · Component Catalogue, 10 · CI/CD

description_objective: Automate the nightly fetching and ingestion of new pre-prints for specified tags using a scheduled GitHub Action, ensuring new PDFs and metadata are added to the corpus.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: fetch_arxiv_batch.py script robust and scheduled
GitHub Action workflow configured and tested
Automated PR/commit of new PDFs and metadata
Error handling and notifications
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires stable arXiv API and correct tag configuration.

tentative_title: Integrate Reading Metrics into Potential Engine (P2)

source_reference.section: 1 · Vision & Measurable Goals (LIT-05), 8 · Synergy & Potential Integration

description_objective: Feed reading metrics (papers read, minutes spent, avg novelty) into the cognitive channel C(t) of the Potential Engine, ensuring correct data flow and metric computation.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: metrics_literature.py script fully functional
reading_stats.parquet generated and consumed by potential_engine.py
Unit tests for metric calculation and integration
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires completion of reading metrics pipeline and clear API for potential_engine.py.

tentative_title: Develop Instrumented PDF Reader Application for Reading Telemetry
description_objective: Design and implement a local web or desktop PDF reader that logs user reading behavior (page turns, scroll speed, highlights, time per page) and integrates with the Cultivation knowledge system for real-time telemetry and analytics.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Instrumented PDF reader app (web or desktop)
Event logging to SQLite or Parquet
Integration with reading_session_baseline
Tests and user documentation
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires evaluation of PDF.js vs. desktop frameworks; must support event logging and potential biometric integrations.

tentative_title: Implement Flashcard Authoring and Review Workflow with YAML and GUI
description_objective: Develop a robust flashcard authoring workflow using YAML files (with schema validation, snippets, and pre-commit hooks) and a GUI-based review interface that supports spaced repetition, logging, and analytics.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: YAML schema and VS Code snippet support
Pre-commit hooks for validation and deduplication
GUI (web or desktop) for flashcard review
Integration with DuckDB and analytics dashboard
notes_questions_dependencies: Should support Anki export/import and future sync; must log review history for analytics.

tentative_title: Integrate Reading and Flashcard Metrics into Cognitive Potential Engine
description_objective: Extend the potential_engine.py script to ingest reading_stats.parquet, flashcard review data from DuckDB, and self-assessment scores to compute and update the C(t) metric for adaptive scheduling and synergy analytics.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Extended potential_engine.py with multi-source metric ingestion
Unit and integration tests
Documentation for metric definitions and data flows
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires well-defined data schemas and robust error handling; may need to coordinate with calculate_synergy.py.

tentative_title: Develop Adaptive Task Scheduling and Prioritization Logic in Task Master
description_objective: Design and implement PID/RL-based adaptive scheduling logic in Task Master that uses C(t) and other metrics to dynamically prioritize knowledge tasks (reading, review, coding exercises) for optimal learning and retention.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Adaptive scheduler in Task Master
Integration with Potential Engine outputs
Tests and simulation notebooks
User documentation
notes_questions_dependencies: Requires close integration with Task Master CLI and metric ingestion; may need to prototype RL/PID logic.

tentative_title: Build Analytics Dashboards for Knowledge Progress and Retention

source_reference.section: Phase 3: Monitoring Retention, Phase 4: Integration & Synergy

description_objective: Develop interactive or static dashboards (using Streamlit, Grafana, or similar) to visualize learning progress, retention rates, forgetting curves, and synergy effects across domains.
potential_deliverables_outcomes: Dashboards for flashcard retention, reading progress, C(t) trends
Automated report generation scripts
Documentation for dashboard usage
notes_questions_dependencies: Should integrate with existing analytics scripts and support both static and live views.
